attributes.action: Rule in favour of the Community stadium at Falmer for Brighton and Hove Albion and help the local area develop.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Too long have we waited for a stadium and when a good site has been selected after 10 years we have been halted by 2 Public Enquiries which have not given an end result but have ruled out all other sites. Please sign this petition and help the Albion get the home they deserve in the only viable location.
